item.title: About Me
item.description: Greetings! ðŸ‘‹ # Introduction # Greetings, I’m Harpreet Singh, a Computer Science major at IIITH, finished my third semester. Having recently completed courses like CS3.301 (Operating Systems and Networks) and CS1.302 (Automata Theory), I find myself intrigued by the practical applications of Computer Science. Witnessing theories come to life in computer systems and algorithms has been truly captivating. What to Expect. # As someone with dynamic interests, my focus shifts based on current happenings.
